mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO release_news( website, release_time, modified_time, news_title, news_url, editor, source ) VALUES
(#{item.website},#{item.releaseTime},#{item.modifiedTime},#{item.newsTitle},#{item.newsUrl},#{item.editor},#{item.source})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE website = values(website), release_time = values(release_time), modified_time = values(modified_time), news_title = values(news_title), editor = values(editor), source = values(source)
